title: game load error
body:
the game doesnt load and gets an error i click the button where it goes to the reconnect screen like the client suggests and it just pops up with the dame error message 

i exited the client relogged on and it still wasnt resolved

replies.body: Which error are you getting specifically?  There's currently an issue for some players per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, which will require you to cancel the error and try reconnecting.  If your error is something else like a bugsplat, let me know.  Hope that hleps!
I'm having a problem where it wants me to reconnect but I don't have a "cancel" option, and I just can't get back into the game and it'll count as a leave and I get leaver buster.

it was a internet failed to connect but everything else was fine, but after ten minutes the game loaded properly and it seemed everyone in game ran into the problem cause the game was only 2 mins in when i finally got in and they said they had the same problem when i apologized cause i thought i was the only one
